Intro.Heading: Dear friends
Intro.Content: We are looking forward to celebrating our wedding day with you. The ceremony and afterparty will all be held at one place – see the venue below.

Welcoming.Heading: WELCOME DRINK
Welcoming.Text: And home made sausages from Pepa’s grandfather.
